meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marge Lindblom Sean Kram Molly Kossoff Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6697.

td.p: Marge Lindblom, a lawyer from Larchmont, New York
Sean Kram, a barista from Edmonds, Washington
Molly Kossoff, a beauty-industry magazine editor from West Hills, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,100)

tr.td: NATIONAL BOOK AWARD WINNERS
FAST FOOD PLACES
"UGA"
CHUCK A...
I CAN'T STOP THIS FEELING
DEEP INSIDE OF ME

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'We wonder if it was a difficult decision to name this William Styron novel the 1980 hardcover fiction winner')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: We wonder if it was a difficult decision to name this William Styron novel the 1980 hardcover fiction winner

the Cougar Cruise

PLANT THE FLAG

(Alex: As a matter of fact, each correct response will rhyme with "strange".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_5', 'clue_DJ_3_5_stuck', '(Marge: Um... This is terrible. Who is--he\'s from Minnesota and the Minnesota Twins. And I am totally blanking on his name.)
(Alex: And you took about fif--you took about 15 seconds to tell us that, and as a result, it cost you $2,000. [*]--)
(Marge: Of course.)
(Alex: --was the Supreme Court justice.)
(Marge: Totally embarrassing.)
[The end-of-round signal sounds.]

Harry Blackmun

Marge
Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
